description.main: The only business management platform you'll ever need.
description.highlight: Streamline invoices, suppliers, clients, and analytics

BusinessSolutions.description: Most businesses waste 20% of their revenue on inefficiencies. Our platform eliminates waste, automates tedious tasks, and gives you the insights to make more money.
BusinessSolutions.salesDescription: Create professional invoices in seconds. Track payments automatically. Never chase money again.
BusinessSolutions.inventoryDescription: Smart stock alerts. Automated reordering. Real-time inventory tracking across all locations.
BusinessSolutions.analyticsDescription: Comprehensive dashboards. Profit analysis. Growth insights. Know exactly where your money goes.
BusinessSolutions.clientsDescription: Complete client profiles. Communication history. Payment tracking. Turn customers into advocates.
BusinessSolutions.ctaDescription: Join thousands of businesses already using our platform to streamline operations and increase profits.

feature3.title: 24/7 Support
feature3.description: Our team is here to help you succeed, whenever you need us.

section.title: Our Business Plans
section.subtitle: Better pricing
section.description: Affordable pricing and packages for smooth billing and efficient productivity
section.content: HRSCommerciale is an online platform designed for small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs & VSEs), offering comprehensive support in the digitization of their work processes. With advanced technologies and modules usually used by large companies, such as the finance module, human resource management, CRM, street vending, etc., HRSCommerciale helps transform their business by reducing costs and increasing revenue. All at competitive rates, promoting their growth towards new horizons.

hero.description: Access the full power of HRS Commerciale with our comprehensive desktop application. Manage your entire business from one powerful platform.

features.title: Everything You Need to Run Your Business
features.subtitle: Our desktop application provides all the tools necessary for complete business management

appInfo.title: Why Choose HRS Commerciale?
appInfo.subtitle: Built specifically for Tunisian businesses with local market needs in mind

features.pos: Complete Point of Sale system with barcode scanning
features.inventory: Advanced inventory management with real-time tracking
features.crm: Customer relationship management (CRM) with purchase history

security.title: Secure & Reliable
security.subtitle: Your business data is protected with enterprise-grade security and 24/7 monitoring

encryption.title: Data Encryption
encryption.description: All data is encrypted both in transit and at rest with AES-256 military-grade encryption

access.title: Secure Access
access.description: Multi-factor authentication, biometric login, and role-based permissions for maximum security

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: Round-the-clock technical support, automated monitoring, and instant issue resolution
